alert.note: Alert for Brown; Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 7:10PM CDT until August 04 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Rock County in north central Nebraska... Eastern Brown County in north central Nebraska... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 709 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles southeast of Long Pine, or 13 miles south of Bassett, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Sybrant, Twin Lakes State Wildlife Management Area and Pony Lake. This includes Highway 183 between mile markers 156 and 177. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
